channel.title: Help- levels to wield
channel.description: on my server i can wield anything at any level i want the right levels like for whip 70 att, and for barrows and 70 defence and i have 3rd age also..if you know how please help!

item.title: Help- levels to wield
item.dc:creator: @croranger croranger
item.description:
@croranger wrote:

than search for this public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) {

you shoud see this

/*Equipment level checking*/ public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 10; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("fighter")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon_Halberd")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Team 6")) { return 99; } } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Granite")) { return 50; } else if (ItemName.endsWith("whip") || ItemName.endsWith("Ahrims staff") || ItemName.endsWith("Torags hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("Veracs flail") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthans warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharoks greataxe")) { return 50; } return 1; }

and under

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1;

add this

if (ItemName.startsWith("Abbysal Whip")) { return 70;

Read full topic
